channel.title: Posts on J.Mwangi Cybersecurity
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on J.Mwangi Cybersecurity

item.title: Visualizing TCP/IP and OSI Models In Action
item.author: jamesmwang1@proton.me (James Mwangi K)
item.description: Step-by-step analysis of OSI model and TCP- IP model using Cisco Packet Tracer. Gain practical knowledge of networking fundamentals while visualizing real-world communication processes.

item.title: Use Wireshark to View Network Traffic
item.author: jamesmwang1@proton.me (James Mwangi K)
item.description: Step-by-step tutorial on using Wireshark for network analysis. Capture ICMP packets, compare local and remote traffic behavior, and explore Layer 2/Layer 3 addressing in practical scenarios.

item.title: Navigating Global Data Protection Compliance: Frameworks, Regulations, and Implementation Strategies
item.author: jamesmwang1@proton.me (James Mwangi K)
item.description: Explore essential data protection regulations including GDPR, HIPAA, PCI DSS, and Kenya’s Data Protection Act. Learn compliance strategies, sector-specific requirements, and legal considerations for penetration testing and audits.

item.title: IAM Privilege Escalation via Policy Rollback
item.author: jamesmwang1@proton.me (James Mwangi K)
item.description: Explore how attackers exploit IAM policy rollbacks to gain administrative access in AWS environments. This CloudGoat scenario demonstrates privilege escalation techniques, policy version analysis, and critical cloud security hardening practices.

item.title: Configuring Azure Firewall for Network Security
item.author: jamesmwang1@proton.me (James Mwangi K)
item.description: A technical walkthrough of Azure Firewall implementation, covering route configuration, DNS management, and firewall rule validation. Demonstrates traffic control between subnets and compliance testing using real-world security scenarios.

item.title: Master the Quartely Clock
item.author: jamesmwang1@proton.me (James Mwangi K)
item.description: Learn how to apply seasonal planning principles—inspired by natural cycles and timeless wisdom—to fortify your cybersecurity operations. By breaking the year into actionable quarters, you can proactively address vulnerabilities, allocate resources strategically, and ensure resilience against both predictable and unforeseen threats.
